website_summaries.verdict: The OnePlus 5T is a superb, affordable phone for new buyers, despite only minor changes from the OnePlus 5.
pros: The OnePlus 5T has a bigger screen and its camera takes better low-light photos than the 5
Its few software tweaks are useful in small ways
cons: The phone's face unlock doesn't authorize payments and its dual camera's digital rather than telephoto zoom is a step back
There's no expandable storage, and it's not rated for water resistance

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: A great improve from my previous phone, I had a Nexus 5 (LG), and the comparison with this, is bigger size, great battery, better resolution camera, the speed of the boot is very fast and the space that it has (64GB) is great, I used to be usually at an 85% of space usage and right now I have 84% free on this OnePlus. I didn't knew about this brand until a friend mentioned it to me as an option to buy an Unlocked phone over Amazon, and check the features and I can guarantee that if you like to have an Android phone this is a very good one.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro G.

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone, it is the best on the market for real life performance. Loud speaker, fast charging, good look and feel, gets a lot of complements but many mistake it for Iphone 7 plus or 8 plus. Update: buy the OnePlus 6t instead it is better.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hoogland

customer_reviews.title: 1+ All the Way
customer_reviews.text: I like my OnePlus 5T, I had a OnePlus 2 and it lasted for two or three years. It was a great phone but I was seriously looking to upgrade. This phone is certainly the upgrade I was looking for. It has fast facial recognition and it has a great camera. the double camera preforms great, and the video quality is great. The amount of RAM makes the phone super fast, and the storage is adequate for what I need in a phone. I wish the storage was expandable so I could buy a micro SD card and make the phone storage larger.
customer_reviews.author: David Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Navigation GPS
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this phone since November 6th 2018 and It’s a breath of fresh air when using it for navigation. No more lost GPS location. Nice big screen. Works great on MetroPCS or Metro now. I don’t really use it for games too much but when I do it works very well pretty smoothly. FPS game and The Room puzzle games has great 3D graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Lisha

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, great camera, good battery, best phone I've had
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've had so far. I've had it for a year and it's still working the same as when I first bought it. There are minor things like external mics not being detected for videos but everything else is pretty much perfect for my needs. Battery is fine for me but maybe average for most people (I have a habit of charging fairly often), very good camera quality, rarely ever gets laggy, and lots of features. I think the only reason not to get it would depend on specific features you're looking for (ex. I don't think it has expandable storage, the thing I mentioned about external mics, you can't transfer files directly to the computer very easily, etc)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Device!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this phone for a month now, and it's great! There's no preinstalled bloatware, and it still gets regular updates. I had to charge it for a while before it would turn on for the first time, but everything else has been smooth sailing. It also charges really quickly, like full charge in less than an hour. It comes with a silicone case that fits really snugly, and they already applied a screen protector to the screen! So overall, I'm very happy with the device.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Two Years and Going Strong
customer_reviews.text: I have had this thing for two years now and it's a beast. No loss of performance, even after dropping it occasionally. The battery charges fine, the apps open quickly and the camera still works wonders. I'm going to regret it when this phone finally does die (or, I lose it more than likely) because I do prefer a 35mm headphone jack versus bluetooth and OnePlus abandoned those with the 6. This is the second OnePlus I've owned (I was a One user) and I'll probably keep purchasing them as long as they're making top quality devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jason ON

customer_reviews.title: This is the best phone I've had in a while
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone I've had in a while. It comes with a clean android, which is amazing after coming from a Samsung S6 which battery lasted about 10h. This one last for over a day.
customer_reviews.author: Angel M.

customer_reviews.title: Phone uses  Google Operation System
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize when I switched from iphone to Android that there would be so many limitiatons and changes that take along time to adjust to. Since most of my relations own iphones, I cannot facetime them or do group texts. The advertising is annoying and the phone seems a bit glitchy at times- VR texting doesn't work 25% of the time and I have to repeat myself. On a positive note, the camera is amazing!!!! (That is why I switched in the first place). It charges VERY quickly and the fact that I can use my outlook calendar has been great!
customer_reviews.author: Peg W.

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping! Excellent Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the phone on Saturday evening, received it on Monday morning. The phone works great, and is a great investment! With proper care, it should perform optimally for 3+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone you can own
customer_reviews.text: Loving this phone after three months. The version of Android OS on it is slick, the battery is great, and the speed is wonderful for all my apps. Perfect choice if you're on AT&T and want to go month to month instead of a contract.
customer_reviews.author: Using my VPN

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold charge and charger is defective
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not charge well. I dont know if I got a defective product or if the mobile does not charge well with 110 volts but the battery life is sometimes less than half a day, even if you just play music and do nothing else. The charger is very unreliable and stops charging randomly, this looks to be a problem for lots of customers but oneplus has done nothing to address it. I had to get a separate power bank to charge the phone. I contacted the sellers but they said that I did not have warranty they couldn't help me out. All around not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Sneha Pandey

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for a month or two and I've been pleased by everything. Great camera, audio jack, near stock Android and super fast performance are just some of the great things this phone has.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Read above
customer_reviews.text: To be honest phone is amazing I had this confused with the 8gb128gb version of the phone ended up from a non prime member it took awhile but i paid like 23$ if I do not get see least 20$ refunded I'm shopping back for the new one then I'll have 2 128gb 8gb one plus 5t

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price, it could use water resistance but it is jammed packed with business and travel focused options

Fast charging, finger print,face recognition etc. Couldn't expect more for the price. I am editing the review after two years. The phone is still working great just as new. Highly recommend

customer_reviews.text: This phone hasn't been since month I bought it and the battery dont last it last 30 mins then it's down to 13% I hope they have a solution for this problem because this phone was not cheap..

customer_reviews.title: one of the best options considering price and performance
customer_reviews.text: great smartphone! good battery performance, fast processor, nice camera, thin and light. One of the best option you have taking into account price and specifications. But I think it could be a little more lighter....
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Device - Review After 1 Year
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for close to a year now. It is just as fast today as it was out of the box. And that's with HEAVY daily use. Now, with this phone being over $100 cheaper than it was when I bought it, I can't recommend it more. The face recognition is flawless. The fingerprint sensor is flawless. The battery life is flawless. Don't waste your money on a phone that is double the price with worse specs and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like phone.
customer_reviews.text: It is the most expensive phone I ever bought. I like everything about this phone: two days minimum on battery life, extremely fast. Camera very good. Important for me it has not a lot of apps installed. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Very very very great over all best phone ever btw
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the great phone it has a long battery life it charges super fast the material is great it has a good value for its very worth it

customer_reviews.title: Poor calling and messaging performance, not built for use in US
customer_reviews.text: This phone is borderline useless as an actual phone. Great pocket computer, happy with camera performance, but long delays when trying to place calls and text messages are frequently not sent or received. I live in an urban area and have verified this is not an issue with service provider. Buy a brand you know and trust. I cannot believe I spent over$400 on a"phone" that doesn't work.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loving this phone but I been feeling with OnePlus since the OG OnePlus One....

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera quality, great battery life and very fast
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for 6 months now and it has been working superbly. Everyone loved the quality of the photos the camera takes, especially when I use Portrait mode. It's also fast and very user friendly. Great battery life, far superior to the flagship Samsung Galaxy's battery life.

customer_reviews.title: Why bother with the name brand ones. Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Beside not using the fingerprint reader because it wasn't being consistent great phone. Went from a OnePlus 3 to a 5, worth every penny. Awesome battery life and great camera.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone overall
customer_reviews.text: Very fast! Great phone overall. I just don't like the fact we can't zoom in when moving the cursor while editing a text.

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy and satisfactory!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery about buying a phone from Amazon but this is a trustworthy buy! Nothing wrong with my phone, came in the original packaging, unopened, with all the accessories. Came with a case for the phone and the flash charge cord and charging head. Also has a screen protector already on which I like about OnePlus. They really thought of everything. This seller is trustworthy, and I am in love with this phone! Had it for about 3 months now and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Draves

customer_reviews.title: A very smart phone and I couldn't wanted a better phone with ...
customer_reviews.text: A very smart phone and I couldn't wanted a better phone with its speed ,size and performance is beyond compare. I think that the OnePlus 5T A 5010 64 GB is the phone of the century.

customer_reviews.title: Oneplus 5T fails
customer_reviews.text: Buu this phone one month ago (15 mayo 2018) and today dont power up, in a brick state. Its not posible to phone fails afterna 4 weeks of use.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it captures pictures, quality is good but the phone did come with headsets how come?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good phone with a big flaw.
customer_reviews.text: I used this phone for six hours and it was an amazing phone BUT when I began to download updates and apps the wifi was slow and would often disconnect. This problem has been a known issue since the phone launched and it has still not been fixed which I feel is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: OnePlus for life
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! I've had a Galaxy S3, a moto G, and now this phone. The experience doesn't even compare; the OnePlus is far and away faster and longer lasting. After a year of use I'm still super happy and getting through a full day of music streaming and light gaming on one charge. I also pull up directions faster than my wife (still using the Moto G) even though we're on the same network. It's painful for me to watch other people and their slow phones, I delt with that for so long but no longer thanks to the 5t!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Charging port was messed up
customer_reviews.text: Okay, don't get me wrong I really like this phone and the camera . But the cases for them are few and far between. The day I purchase this phone I had issues with the charger "it had a hard time charging and rapid charging like it did not want to connect". Fast forward a year and now this phone will not charge at all, the charging port is messed up and loose. So I guess that's why I had issues to began with!
customer_reviews.author: Lester

customer_reviews.title: For the price, im suprised it isn't more recognized
customer_reviews.text: Its a fairly good phone for a reasonable price, compared to most phones such as the galaxy series or iphone. Probably the biggest features that this phone comes with is a 6 inch screen, OLED display, 64GB storage, 6 GB of RAM, fast charging, a fairly reasonable OS and as a added bonus, being also possible in unlocking the device and installing your own ROM. Oxygen OS seems pretty good, but adding your own ROM will give you better assurance in privacy and possibly stability, speed and customization. Overall the phones good, especially for $435.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Oneplus 5T phone a few weeks ago based on a lot of research and since the model I got was not the newest model I got a great deal on it. This phone is fast and the screen quality is excellent in my opinion which along with it's cameras make me glad this is the one I bought at this point in time.
customer_reviews.author: Old Boy

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work just fine, I love that it came with a case and screen protector. Box was kind of smudgy but I'm getting rid of it anyway. It's crazy how fast the phone is, and the battery lasts ages compared to my old 5X.
customer_reviews.author: Nacho

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying from this seller

Am enjoylng my 5t....upgrade from a V20 Lg.,...This phone has an issue...it sticks on silent...plenty missed calls,..can't get the slider to move from vibrate

customer_reviews.title: I like the phone

customer_reviews.author: Regis A Biarrieta

customer_reviews.title: Fast and premium feeling, extremely high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the best phone I've ever used. Everything is amazing, the camera, the speed, the build quality. OOS is fantastic, the snapdragon 835 destroys anything I throw at it. This phone can run any game flawlessly, and emulates Wii/GC pretty well to boot. I am extremely happy with this phone.

product_meta.title: OnePlus 5T A5010 64GB Midnight Black, Dual Sim, 6.01", 6GB RAM, GSM Unlocked International Model, No Warranty
product_meta.description: Everything works great, screen protector on it has scratches. Original box, cable, charger and additional case included.
feature_bullets: OnePlus 5T A5010 (China Model) Unlocked, Operating System: OxygenOS based on Android 7.1.1 Nougat, CPU: Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 (Octa-core, 10nm, up to 2.45GHz), Storage: 64GB, 6GB, Sensors: Fingerprint, Hall, Accelerometer, G-sensor, Electronic Compass, Gyroscope, Proximity, Ambient Light Sensor, RGB, Sensor Hub. Dual SIM, Display Size: 6.01 inches. Rear camera: 16MP + 20MP (Dual LED Flash).
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carrier such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
The box contains: Your new device, USB cable, Charger, Documentation.
